languages.english-overview:
PeoplePods is a developer-friendly social software toolkit.
Build applications where people meet, talk, share, read, work, publish and explore.
PeoplePods provides a flexible infrastructure within which members of a site can create, comment upon, and consume content of arbitrary types.
PeoplePods is released under the PeoplePods License.
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_email: Please provide the email to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_email: The Admin email is incorrect and does not exist!
